website_summaries.verdict: This painted pine wood bench is great for a rustic-style space.
pros: A sturdy bench with a two-tone style and easy assembly
The construction is solid, and you can opt for the table and bench combo at a decent price
Measures 36.2 inches wide by 14 inches deep by 18 inches high
cons: Some customers noted some defects and notches in the wood

customer_reviews.title: Nice Bench
customer_reviews.text: I needed a bench to do school event photography. This one fit my needs for it's size and it's light enough to move back and forth. My only gripe is the finish on the sitting board. It seems a bit cheap for the price I paid. It's very sturdy once you sit on it but a bit wobbly while you prepare to sit on it. The legs are placed inside the corners so I assume to help support the weight of the person or persons but also their placement contributes to it's unsteady initial feelings as you are preparing to sit down. I believe if they move the legs to the corners it would improve it's stability.
customer_reviews.author: PFranco

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy bench but not espresso in color
customer_reviews.text: Like what others have said this little bench was 1) Shipped and wrapped well 2) No major scratches however the scratches would be easily seen if used as a coffee table and 3) Very easy to put together. My major gripe is the description of the color. It's a dark cherry not espresso. Second product ordered from Zinus and I love it! Saved my pretty breakfast nook table from destruction due to awful chairs.
customer_reviews.author: MrsRogers

customer_reviews.title: Probably the best quality discount furniture on amazon
customer_reviews.text: I am pleasantly surprised by the quality of the wood and the sturdiness of the furniture. I ordered it for an apartment that I plan to only live in temporarily and thus did not want to spend to a lot of money on furniture. I was expecting the typical type of cheap furniture that you can get on amazon: unsturdy pressed wood, dusty packaging, complex assembly. But when I received this, along with the wood table by the same company, I was very pleased to discover that the furnature looked very nice and was made on solid strong wood. Also, the assembly is very easy—literally it only takes 5-10 minutes and is only five steps.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: FIVE STARS!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very attractive budget item that arrived neatly packaged and protected with no damage or defects. It assembled in minutes with the included ratchet tool. Highly impressed the styrofoam even had plastic wrap to reduce cleanup. I’ve assembled a lot of mail-order furniture over the last few months, but this was the best quality I’ve seen in a do-it-yourself kit; this company obviously takes QC very seriously. The BirdRock 34” rubber boot tray is a perfect accessory for shoe storage. So highly recommended I decided to order a second one for my stairway landing. This item, while simple, sturdy and practical in its design, will not disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great deal for the money... would buy again
customer_reviews.text: This was a replacement bench that I purchased for my dinning room set, and it is GREAT! If I would have bought this in the first place I would not have needed to buy a replacement one. First off lets talk packaging. Whoever packaged this was a genius. All the Styrofoam packing pieces are in bags of their own so they don' t break apart and get little white stuff EVERYWHERE! 2nd its a great looking bench, legs go on nice and tight, my husband put together in less then 1/2 hour. I couldn't be happier!
customer_reviews.author: R.M.M

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: This company has packaging down! I love how every piece is protected in the box, and they even seal their styrofoam piece so you don't have broken styrofoam floating around the box. The bench itself is a little smaller than I expected, but fits my needs just fine. I was only needing something to go in front of a window, so I honestly didn't even pay a lot of attention to the dimensions - I just saw it was a life size bench in a good color by a company I've come to trust. Nice and sturdy, very easy to assemble - the company even threw in a small rachet tool to make assembly that much easier!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, strong, and beautiful wood finish.
customer_reviews.text: Bench is abcolutely perfect! It is sturdy, strong, and easy to build! It is worth every penny. It was shipped and received extremely fast. I didn’t have any trouble with the time it took to arrive. I am pleased with how simple it was to build and enjoyed the tool it came with to tighten all screws. Definitely recommend this bench.
customer_reviews.author: Cristel

customer_reviews.title: Quality product, thoughtfully packaged
customer_reviews.text: I’m in awe. I generally buy furniture on the less expensive side because we’re a military family and everything gets damaged when we move. First thing I noticed was that the styrofoam packaging was wrapped in thin plastic which contains the annoying loose tiny balls of styrofoam. Maybe that’s silly, but it was helpful. Second thing, the box comes with a sweet note and cards to send to new neighbors or old friends. Third, who enjoys putting anything together with an Allen wrench? This product came with an ALLEN WRENCH RATCHET!!! Game changer. Finally, it was easy to put together in a few minutes.
customer_reviews.author: On a budget

customer_reviews.title: Perfect little bench
customer_reviews.text: I’m am extremely pleased with the packing and timely delivery of this perfect little bench! Only one point I wish it was darker it looks more like cherry than espresso but I still love it!!! Also the baby ratchet it made assembling easy! Thank you for a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Incredible value.
customer_reviews.text: To start, the packaging of this bench was perfect. It was so well protected and padded, there was no chance something could happen to it. The wood is beautiful and it heavy and solid. Everything screwed in very smoothly and was lined up perfectly. The provided ratchet is really great! What a nice touch. This is the best value in furniture that I've ever seen, and this will be the first company I will check for future needs.
customer_reviews.author: peterbee

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Mr. Roger's bench!
customer_reviews.text: It's a pretty saucy bench. And I love that all the styrofoam comes wrapped in plastic so it doesn't get all over the place. Plus they give you a nice crescent hex key that you'll want to keep. It fits perfectly! It's my little Mr.Roger's bench. I have a seat to change shoes every time I leave and come home!
customer_reviews.author: John Rael

customer_reviews.title: Terrific company and a terrific product!
customer_reviews.text: Zinus is, hands down, the most thorough and thoughtful company I've ever ordered a product from—furniture or otherwise. The packaging is wrapped in plastic so styrofoam doesn't infest your house; the hardware comes in a neat blister pack; they even included a tiny ratchet and thank you cards. (That ratchet is now the cutest and most useful member of my tool box, so thanks!!) The furniture itself is so solid and well-made that I've never been afraid to let my little nephews go crazy around them, which I cannot say about some other tables and benches I've ordered. And then the price is reasonable, too?? All I'm saying is, I'm not buying furniture from anyone else. A++ experience, guys.
customer_reviews.author: S.N.

customer_reviews.title: Real wood, sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Don’t overthink it, it’s a simple wooden bench. I was impressed by the fact that it is all wood, no particleboard or veneer. The metal brackets in the 4 corners that you bolt the legs to are substantial, heavy metal, not at all flimsy. Although assembly was obvious, 4 legs, 2 bolts each, I appreciated that the instructions were in good English, and even humorous. Nice detail, they included not only an Allen wrench, but a ratchet tool, too. That made it easier. Good value for the money, for a nice, simple little wood bench.
customer_reviews.author: PetalumaGirl

customer_reviews.title: Seems like a sturdy bench
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a sturdy bench. Super easy to put together. However the legs are like a mint green instead of white. It’s a little deceiving. The pop of color looks fine but not what I was exactly expecting
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Very good, sturdy all wood product
customer_reviews.text: Very good, sturdy all wood product. I plan on sanding the top of bench and staining them in dark walnut color to match my dining table top. It is not completely white but a little tint of green in it. But it still goes well with my farmhouse style white dining chair with walnut color table top as well as Ikea Ingolf dining chair. May be I am not so fussy about the slight color diff in white. But overall, love it. Sturdy and worth the price I paid for it.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Handsome value
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this table 2 years ago and never really liked the chairs I got to go with it, until I found this matching bench. The dining space totally makes sense now, and for the money you really can’t beat it! I put a large piece of glass on top of the matching dining table, and it makes the space huge and allows for entertaining a crowd.
customer_reviews.author: Michael M.

customer_reviews.title: Farmhouse bench
customer_reviews.text: We're upgrading the cat's bathroom. This bench gives her some privacy without trapping her. It was packaged with care. Easy to put together. All tools included. But why are there extra holes drilled along the inside edges? Just got it today. Seems sturdy. Nice looking, quality solid wood. So we hope it proves to be long lasting.
customer_reviews.author: feralcat

customer_reviews.title: Would have rated more stars if they had em
customer_reviews.text: First off the craftsman ship is off the charts! No crap wood used for this bench! Very very sturdy and excellent wood finish. It even came with an Alan wrench with a crank like a socket wrench has on it to put it together! Very very easy to assemble! Even the styrofoam was covered in plastic so when you pulled it out it didn’t get anywhere and fall all sort on the floor! This is the best packed item I’ve ever purchased on amazon! If your looking for an adorable high quality bench table please get this one! You will not be disappointed with your purchase I swear!
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: what i expected
customer_reviews.text: i only gave 4 stars since i dont know if the product will last but its extremely stury and i do not expect any issues. its a nice brown color, the right size and simple. i was hoping it would fit two 15"x18" liter pans underneath side by side but it does not so one box is situated the long way and sticks out a little but its okay because i just need a place to sit in my back hall for a moment to put on shoes once in a while and also wanted to hide the sight of the liter boxes. mission accomplished.
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Assembly Caution
customer_reviews.text: The bench seems sturdy even through one of the legs cracked while assembling it. I wrote the manufacturer and asked if I could purchase one leg. They said since I bought it from Amazon, I would have to take it up with them directly. Since I had already assembled and didn't want to try to repackage, I didn't pursue a return. Be wary that manufacturers are not always willing to provide parts unless you buy direct.
customer_reviews.author: Mz Bull

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded expectations
customer_reviews.text: I wanted this for a little corner in our home that houses the record player. It came very well packaged/protected, was easy to assemble and looks much more expensive than it was. The company included a ratchet tool which made getting the screws inch less frustrating (I’m going to keep it for tightening our ikea items.) The company also included some stationary to send notes to friends and a thoughtful note of their own. Small touches but definitely memorable. I would definitely recommend this item:)
customer_reviews.author: Amanda M.

customer_reviews.title: Solid, Attractive Bench
customer_reviews.text: First of all the packaging of this bench was both protective and neat. All styrofoam was encased in plastic so no mess. Hardware was organized in a plastic packaging. Cute, functional little ratchet wrench was included. Each of the legs came with felt padding on the feet. Bench is beautiful, solid wood. Very sturdy and attractive piece. For the price this bench cannot be beat!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara F.

customer_reviews.title: BEST PURCHASE EVER.
customer_reviews.text: Not only is this real wood, strong (and I mean I have four wild children) but it's gorgeous. It came beautifully packaged, with its own tools inside, and even spare hardware! Easy to assemble, and built to last. They even throw in a free little gift in there. I will be buying a second bench shortly, and then shopping their other products! BEYOND IMPRESSED.
customer_reviews.author: Cyndi

customer_reviews.title: 'light roast' espresso at best
customer_reviews.text: Great bench. Sturdy, well packed, well built, easy to assemble. Unfortunately the 'espresso' color is much lighter than my espresso dining table and espresso cabinets. It's my own fault, I should have trusted the photos which do appear to show how light it is, but I ordered it on my phone. I took off one star as a result, but if you need a light brown bench this thing is great.
customer_reviews.author: James Williams

customer_reviews.title: Pretty nice product for the price
customer_reviews.text: I just got this bench and put it together. First off, packaging was incredible. There was no way anything could have been damaged. I read other reviews about the little ratchet wrench that comes with it. Very cool and makes it easy to put together. It took me maybe 10 minutes to unbox and put together. I bought it to put a TV on it in the sunroom but it's too small. I will keep it and use it elsewhere. Great job Zinus....
customer_reviews.author: USN Chief retired

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Bench and a Great Value.
customer_reviews.text: The bench arrived very well packed and padded. The assembly was very easy and fast. (Really didn’t need directions.) It’s a very nice-looking, sturdy, solid wood piece of furniture. I’m very pleased with it and have no complaints. The only issue for some people could be that the color is nowhere as dark as espresso. It’s more a red mahogany. If you’re looking for that near-black espresso that only shows cherry undertone in bright light, this may not be for you.
customer_reviews.author: Queen of the Rodeo

customer_reviews.title: Very nice bench. Aesthetically pleasing.
customer_reviews.text: I like this little bench. It’s very nice to look at. Their is just enough room for three adults to sit on it in front of the Christmas tree and take a family Christmas picture. The rest of the year it sits at the end of my bed and I can put stuff on it and it looks good in my room
customer_reviews.author: megan mahon

customer_reviews.title: Company that cares
customer_reviews.text: Beautifull bench that arrived in a perfectly packaged box with cool thank you cards to boot! For the price, you wouldn't expect that extra attention to detail and thought. They went that extra mile for the customer satisfaction. I wasted three hours before purchasing this on amazon running to 5 different stores looking for a bench. Not a single store had any benches in stock. Wish I hadn't wasted my time. Do yourself a favor, don't waste your time and just order this one!
customer_reviews.author: Styly

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, cheap, rustic, very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I love this bench. But as others have stated, the top appears to either be damaged or purposely weathered. There were a few long ding marks on the top. This is OK because I like the rustic look. I ended up sanding the top with light sandpaper to make the dings look purposeful. The brown color is a little bit more honey color than I would normally choose. Sanding it dimmed this down a bit. The legs were a bright white. Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: AJP

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I have only good things to say about this bench! It is perfect. Sturdy, but still stylish. Right price. Comes in excellent packaging with all the necessary tools and hardware. Easy to put together. I'm a heavy gal, and I feel secure every morning when I use this to do my make up.
customer_reviews.author: E. McKenzie

customer_reviews.title: Very nice sturdy. Nice wood
customer_reviews.text: Very thick sturdy. Not cheapy. Using it for a workout bench in apt. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Denise blue

customer_reviews.title: COFFEE TABLE / DINING BENCH
customer_reviews.text: Everything arrived quickly and it was obviously packaged with care. It was all done neatly and the wood was protected during shipping. This dining bench is not only for extra seating at the table ( during special occasions), but I’ll also be using this as my coffee table too. It’s very nice and sturdy. It’s a great little piece for a very fair price. This is a good company. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: MoeRoe from MA

customer_reviews.title: Best bench for the price
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with how the bench was packed and shipped. Bench arrived in a very sturdy box. All styrofoam was wrapped in plastic so you didn't have all those styrofoam beads flying everywhere. The tool to put the bench together was awesome. All the parts aligned beautifully and I got it together in under 5 minutes. It goes well with my kitchen décor. Very happy with the product. The only bad thing is that I got a splinter from the only one rough spot under the bench when I went to stand it upright!
customer_reviews.author: Janet B

customer_reviews.title: smaller than i thought
customer_reviews.text: I brought this for my front entry just for decoration. So the fact that is was smaller than I thought was a little disappointing since I wanted to put more decorations on it. But it was very easy to assemble and still looks cute. The price wasn't that bad either. Just keep in mind this is bench is probably meant for one person comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: rae

customer_reviews.title: Looking to Zinus first in the future
customer_reviews.text: I would give more than five stars if I could. I purchased this bench on a leap, hoping it would match the dining chairs I received from a property owner at my old job. Not only did it perfectly complete my dining set, but I felt that the customer service of this company was superb. In addition to providing extra screws and washers just in case, they included a reusable dog bone socket wrench and a wonderful thank-you note. Additionally, the set-up only took about twenty minutes of my time, and I really feel that I was provided a sturdy, quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Least Likely To Review

customer_reviews.title: Durable and stylish
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with this purchase. This bench is very sturdy and built to last. There aren't any rough spots on the wood. It was packaged nicely, arrived on time, and was super easy to put together. The company included great tools and even extras incase you lose anything. I put this together in 5 min, it's just 2 screws per bench leg. It also came with thin felt pads on the bench legs so your floors won't get scuffed. I got this to go with the 60" Large Becky Farmhouse Table and it matches great.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Very good price and quality, packaging was great. So everything was snug and sure not to be damaged. The styrofoam was wrapped which is nice so you don't get all the annoying little pieces all over your floor. Putting it together was so easy my 6 year old helped. Took under 10 minutes. Sturdy. My only complaint is this is not espresso, more of a cherry wood. But since it is real wood I figure I can stain it darker to match my dining table.
customer_reviews.author: DIANNY158

customer_reviews.title: Happy 😊
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the quality of this product. Was very surprised at how pretty it looks and how easy it was to put together. I put it at the end of my queen bed. Be aware that it is a softer wood and I already have some marks on the top making it appear a little distressed. I would suggest a pad or cover blanket on top. This is a good weight bench, stable on my bedroom carpet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Arrived damaged, twice.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered one of these, and it arrived with a damaged top. (We did put it together before realizing and it was super easy to assemble.) I returned it for a replacement and the second one had the same issue, not as bad but definitely poorly milled. Really lacking in the quality control department.. the bench was the perfect size and coloring for what I needed. I was tempted to order a third but fool me three times...
customer_reviews.author: Lacey

customer_reviews.title: Well Built Using as a Coffee Table.
customer_reviews.text: This is a GREAT bench, but I am using it for a coffee table. It is WELL made, easy to assembly and the notes they send with it are GREAT. Zinus must be a GREAT company. Will buy from Zinus again.
customer_reviews.author: ruthie

customer_reviews.title: Works exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: This bench is large enough for two adults (or three really small adults that like each other a lot). It took about 20 minutes to put together, and it was really. I will note that I got a splinter from the underside of the bench, so be careful with animals/small children while you are assembling it. Other than that, it looks great and does exactly what it's supposed to do!
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Looks/ feels  a lot more expensive
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorite amazon purchases thus far. I wondered of the quality and sturdiness would be worth it for the price. As soon as I opened it I was pleasantly surprised by the quality of the material. Once I set it up ( which took less than 10 min) I was in love. Looks/feels a lot more expensive than the price would lead you to believe.
customer_reviews.author: Kventures

customer_reviews.title: No white dots!
customer_reviews.text: They went the extra mile: the styrofoam blocks for packing were all enclosed in plastic, eliminating those little white dots that cling to everything. In addition to the normal allen wrench, they included a reversable ratchet allen wrench. Both were unexpected ... but appreciated. The bench is nice too!
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME bench!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am REALLY impressed by this bench! From the packaging not only being good enough to protect it during shipping, but it also has plastic wrap covering each styrofoam piece so it doesn't break all over your floor. They also include a generic Allen wrench and a nice ratcheting Allen wrench to hold on to for tightening in the future. The quality and ease for assembly was so surprising, especially at this price. Will definitely buy more from this manufacturer in the future!
customer_reviews.author: Maximilian's Mommy

customer_reviews.title: wonderful wonderful wonderful so nice had to say it thrice :-)
customer_reviews.text: It's a beautiful product sturdy solid wood smooth finish the quality it's self is Immaculate. It's become the favorite seat that the kitchen table. The product packaging was the best I've ever seen each individual Styrofoam was strong and plastic wrapped for optimal protection and convenient unpacking (no mess no stress) also it came with extra screws and washers with the most wonderful little ratchet tool that made putting it together a Breeze it took maybe ten minutes all together to have it built and under my table.Will buy from this company again any time I need more furniture
customer_reviews.author: Picky person 🤗

customer_reviews.title: Great bench for a great price.
customer_reviews.text: I needed extra seating for a party and a place to drop my bags when I come into the house. It fit the bill perfectly. I assembled it myself in under 30 minutes. I have had weighty and elderly friends sit on it to remove shoes and it is safe and sturdy as well.
customer_reviews.author: Minnesota Debs

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This bench is really nice, and so easy to put together. I do not like putting things together, but me and my 4 year old were able to put this bench together within 30 minutes max. Lol! Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: ecalhoun

customer_reviews.title: Shockingly good quality
customer_reviews.text: Needed two platforms for my young grand kids to play foozball and found these. Cheaper and faster than making my own, solid wood, (not oak, but who cares). The packaging was extraordinary!!! All the styrofoam was shrink wrapped with pressed cardboard corners and clear and concise directions. We cut down the legs and now my 6 year old grand daughter can actually see the ball. Wish I could add a photo.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly, well packaged, sturdy piece.
customer_reviews.text: Packaged well. Super simple to assemble, can be put together with one person. Seriously much sturdier than I was expecting. My 200lb partner is rough on it - tips it and rocks it on 2 legs while they're sitting on it. (not recommended, by the way, just letting you know that it somehow holds up to that)
customer_reviews.author: MJG

customer_reviews.title: Style and value!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to match the Farmhouse Wood Table. It’s very sturdy with thick wood - surprising for the price! I liked the bench for when we have kids and groups over since I wanted the option to squish people in. But this bench is a bit narrow and you couldn’t fit more than 2 adults on it (even if someone is willing to sit on the tippy end), and even 3 kids might not be possible. Overall, great bench for the money though! Very easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer A.

customer_reviews.title: Beyond high expectations!
customer_reviews.text: If I could give this bench more stars, I would. Great quality (both the wood and brass hardware), easy to put together, nice looking, etc. The included ratchet was quite helpful. The included (VERY simple), instructions, extra hardware and even reusable thank you cards with envelope were some added bonuses. Don't hesitate to buy this product. Don't hesitate to buy from this company!
customer_reviews.author: kelly

customer_reviews.title: Great product - Nothing cheap about it but price.
customer_reviews.text: We have 2 of these now. We really liked the look and sturdiness of the first so we bought another. This bench is very sturdy, solid construction, and feels like a much more expensive bench than it is.
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: Top not a finished product
customer_reviews.text: This bench was exactly what I was looking. Very easy to assemble. Even included ratchet and hex tool to put on legs. Very disappointed with top. Not finished well at all. For the money I expected better. Ended up doing some sanding and lacquered the top. Then bought through Amazon a leather cushion top for it. Again I don’t understand with what they are charging for this why the top is not a more finished product.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Little Bench
customer_reviews.text: Just received this. It took 5 minutes to put together. Easy peasy assembly. I have a tiny BR, and this petite bench is exactly what I wanted, and it looks completly at home with my white wicker headboard and night table. Sturd, nice quality. Good value for the money. I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia Pokart

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: I am a plus-sized woman, and I was worried this bench might feel flimsy, or worse, break the first time I sat on it. I've had it for six months now, and I love it. It is plenty sturdy for me, and I don't worry about it at all anymore. I also ordered the matching table (and the legs matched perfectly, contrary to other reviews I had read). I just love the look of it!
customer_reviews.author: Limoncello

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Farmhouse Bench!
customer_reviews.text: This company is absolutely winning at life! I 100% love this bench! Putting it together was super easy, it came with all necessary items, and they even included a rachet for tightening down the bolts easier! The bench is perfectly constructed and we'll made. This is exactly what we wanted for an entryway area to stop and take our shoes off. Goes with our farm house perfectly. So incredibly impressed! Way to go Zinus!! I will buy from you again, I'm sure!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. J

customer_reviews.title: Great little kitchen bench
customer_reviews.text: Love this Bench! Super cute. Looks great with the Zinus Table. It was very easy to assemble, directions and everything you need are included. I have been wanting to purchase another, hopefully they will be back in stock soon.
customer_reviews.author: Mattymack

customer_reviews.title: Very good bench
customer_reviews.text: We bought a bench and the matching table from this company and they're both really solid. Little details, like how all the packing styrofoam is wrapped in plastic so you don't get bits of styrofoam everywhere when unpacking, indicate good quality. The table and bench are solid wood and seem quite sturdy. Assembly of both was easy, things lined up as they should.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I buy a lot of stuff online. This is by far the best. I can't say enough how I am pleased with this purchase. The packing itself was phenomenal, the quality of every inch of this piece is 100% top of the line, and the ease of putting it together and knowing it is sturdy gives me complete satisfaction. I shouldn't be so amazed by the quality all-together but I am. You just don't get quality like this often and the price does not give it justice. They could easily sell this piece for more but they don't. Value + Price 199%
customer_reviews.author: Maria C.

customer_reviews.title: Nice bench
customer_reviews.text: A lovely, study bench to add seating to your table. I also bought the matching table but it would work for any style.
customer_reviews.author: Haley Kasprzyk

customer_reviews.title: Nice bench; super easy install
customer_reviews.text: Just put the four legs on with 8 screws. Not much easier. The bench came with a mini "ratchet allen/hex wrench" which is a first for me. Usually end up with so many of those smaller allen wrenches over time that you toss later, but this one is a keeper.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: This bench is super cute in my living room. The only downside is that I didn't really look closely enough at the color of the bench. I thought it was more of a beach wood color/more grayish and it turns out it's super light colored. It's not a big deal, I ended up painting it white, but other than that, it's a great little bench.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Nice little bench, wrong color description
customer_reviews.text: I'm giving this bench 4 stars because it's a sturdy little piece of furniture and was very easy to assemble. My only issue with it is the fact that the description of the product says the color is espresso, which generally means a very dark brown. This is more of a lighter cherry wood in color not even remotely close to espresso. I'm keeping though and will make it work as I'm only using it for a plant stand in my office. I just wish it matched the rest of my espresso furniture.
customer_reviews.author: RH72

customer_reviews.title: Real Wood and Very Sturdy....
customer_reviews.text: Wow, I was pleasantly surprised when I opened up the package. Well thought of packaging, they even send you blank Thank You cards to give give to friends. The bench is ALL wood, everything...Very strudy construction. Nice finish. So easy to assemble, really..Even comes with a cute tool. A great product and expirience. Will look for other products made by this company. .
customer_reviews.author: adrien salazar

customer_reviews.title: It's a cute and sturdy bench but the legs are DEFINITELY mint green
customer_reviews.text: It's a cute and sturdy bench but the legs are DEFINITELY mint green, not white as advertised. It's too much work at this point to take it apart and send it back, so we are just going to repaint the legs. But the item description should be updated to reflect this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just what my old piano needed
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to assemble, sturdy, and fits in with my piano. The old bench worried me, and I feared I could not afford a new bench, or that I would not find one that fit in. This one was perfect. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: Vince Matal

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a bench for my closet, but it had to be a specific size to fit. So, I looked at a lot of listings, searching by looks, measurements, and how much weight it could hold (I am very heavy). This bench is perfect! I love it!
customer_reviews.author: suzyb

customer_reviews.title: I only wish that the colors were better. The legs are not white but rather yellowish ...
customer_reviews.text: I only wish that the colors were better. The legs are not white but rather yellowish tint. Not my favorite.. I also purchased the matching table.
customer_reviews.author: OMM

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: This bench is perfect and could be used for a variety of purposes. I am using it as a TV stand. It looks like a much MORE EXPENSIVE piece of furniture, not flimsy or wobbly at all. Is strong and sturdy. Finish color is beautiful. Very easy to assemble and company provides extra screws just in case. The quality and price of this bench is unbeatable.
customer_reviews.author: Jeri P.

customer_reviews.title: I'm in love with my plant bench
customer_reviews.text: Packaged perfectly. No syroform balls sticking to everything. Easy to ensemble, great tools, extra hardware....no brainer. Note the express one is 3 inches longer than the white one. Great purchase!!!
customer_reviews.author: rollinalong

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assembly and the price is right. I got 4 and might get more. They are sturdy and I sprayed them for outside use and water damage. They look very nice. I have 2 by the pool and the other 2 next to the fire pit.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Bagack

customer_reviews.title: Perfect benches without breaking the bank
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping, easy to put together, matched my current table remarkably well, and created not just more seating but more space to the room. I bought 2 for about the same price for one at my local furniture stores. Fantastic and a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Nellie

customer_reviews.title: Good quality. Worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Better quality than expected. Appreciated the attention to detail and thought that clearly went into making sure the buyer has a good experience. It came with a pretty nice tool, quality, not like those ikea tools that hurt your hand and can’t be used for anything else. Pleasantly surprised and impressed. Good finishing on the wood too. No rough edges or unfinished areas. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Vjm

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bench for the entryway
customer_reviews.text: The first bench arrived with damage to the oak that looked like a manufacturing error: someone lost control of the saw/sander and made grooves in the surface. No hassle return the next day. The second bench arrived within 3 days and was without flaw. Easy to assemble and sturdy. A great price for a nice quality item.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: Amazing packaging and quality product!!
customer_reviews.text: Matched my existing table/chairs amazing. The packaging was impeccable, all tools necessary for assembly were provided, the instructions were crystal clear, and it took minutes to put together. I’m so happy with this purchase. I have to say this again, THE PACKAGING WAS INCREDIBLE. No shipping damage. The top of the bench part looks like it’s not fully finished, but honestly it’s not a big deal to me. 10/10 love it .
customer_reviews.author: S Page

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: WOW!! From the price to the shipping to the presentation to the finished product EVERYTHING was amazing!!! If I needed one of these for every room I'd buy several more! By far the best packaging and care I've ever seen put into a product! Extremely easy assembly & product looks better in person than the pictures....which is usually NOT the case! HIGHLY recommend this!! I am using it for my front entry way and its absolutely perfect!! It deserves way more than 5 stars for sure!!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Good enough
customer_reviews.text: Very simple to put together perfect for my kitchen table. Guess I didn’t pay attention to measurements because I thought it would be longer it will fit two adults tho so it’s fine.
customer_reviews.author: Tee

customer_reviews.title: Really nice
customer_reviews.text: Got this to slide under my kitchen table so that I could remove two chairs and streamline my kitchen a bit. This worked. The color is slightly more red than shown online, but it works with what I have. the wood was packaged nicely, and took no time to assemble. Great value and I'm very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: brooklyn girl

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy & good price
customer_reviews.text: This bench is a great deal! It's really quick to put together and feels a lot sturdier than $50 should get you. Perfect for extra seating around the table. It doesn't tip when my 3&5 year olds climb up on it and it comes with felt pads on the feet.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING Product!
customer_reviews.text: I am floored by the amazing quality of this bench. Solid wood and super sturdy. Very easy to assemble. I will definitely be buying more in the future. If your looking for a review to convince you to buy this product, here it is!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren R.

customer_reviews.title: Great Bench!
customer_reviews.text: I was so impressed when I opened the package! Everything was so neatly packed, and after taking out the bench seat, I was surprised to see a little Allan head ratchet for assembly! Made things so much easier. Very easy to assemble, and sturdy once I was done. Actually thinking of ordering another one!
customer_reviews.author: Shy

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice for the price, solid to sit on.
customer_reviews.text: Liked no visible screws when assembled. Also worth a note that I'm adding to this review a year later to say it's held up very nicely and also is much more 'solid' feeling to sit down on than similar sized cheaper stuff (I'm looking at you Ikea...)
customer_reviews.author: AB

customer_reviews.title: Narrow and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for the hallway to seat when putting on shoes. Can seat easily 2 people and great for smaller hallway space! Very easy to assemble and it came with 3 pretty greeting cards for you to use. The greeting cards were a very nice touch! Would recommend the product!
customer_reviews.author: Van N.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love! Super easy to assemble, looks great, paint is whiter than it appears in photos which is great. Wood is solid, stained top not a veneer. Stain does smell very strong right out of the box but did dissipate after 2 days. Great price!
customer_reviews.author: Bethany

customer_reviews.title: Zinus is my go to brand!
customer_reviews.text: The quality is awesome! I just ordered another one because I was so pleased with the first one!! When in doubt Zinus is the go to! I also own 4 of the Zinus bedframes!
customer_reviews.author: Linz

customer_reviews.title: Very Well made
customer_reviews.text: I am so in love with this bench, I also bought the table as well - they came very well packaged and took about 15 mins tops to set up. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Dee1002

customer_reviews.title: What a steal!
customer_reviews.text: This bench was packaged well, easy to put together. The price was low compared to others but the quality is the same. Definately a steal. This bench is shorter than many on the market are, but that's actually why I chose it.
customer_reviews.author: AEG

customer_reviews.title: great value
customer_reviews.text: Totally impressed by the quality of this little table. Real wood, easy to put together with the tools they include, sturdy when assembled. Perfect for the new 43" TV in our living room.
customer_reviews.author: Joan I Williams SD

customer_reviews.title: I love this bench
customer_reviews.text: This bench came quickly, was easy to assemble and is very sturdy. I primarily use this bench to put plants on in front of my window. It fits just below the window sill and is quite attractive. I have also used it for extra seating during large holiday gatherings. Easily fits two adults or three children.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Bench!!
customer_reviews.text: The bench is very sturdy and looks great! It was packaged very neat, even the styrofoam was individually wrapped in plastic to avoid all the mess it makes!! The company even sends a thank you note~ I was immpressed :)
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful bench! It was packed so carefully. I was looking for a bench to put with my antique table and it’s perfect. If you are considering this bench, don’t hesitate you won’t be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Good value and nice quality.
customer_reviews.text: I love this bench! I have a dining set with four chairs and wanted simple additional seating. The package was securely sealed and free if any damage. Easy to put together with clear instructions and special ratchet! I’m extremely happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: vcahn

customer_reviews.title: Nice wood and sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: This bench is great for sitting down and changing your shoes, etc. I added a cushion to add color. Looks great by the back door. It is a good value, too.
customer_reviews.author: doc

customer_reviews.title: You won't be disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The color wasn't as dark as I was hoping for but still a very dark rich color. I love it. Beautifully made. Easy to assemble and I absolutely loved how all the styrofoam packaging in the box, with the pieces of real wood was completely wrapped in plastic, made it super mess free. Plus i loved the little free gifts that came with it to include thank you cards and a mini ratchet. Best item ordered online ever. I would continue to order from them.
customer_reviews.author: Rlynn

customer_reviews.title: Painted wood is not off-white!  Its a pale green!
customer_reviews.text: I love the style - very contemporary farmhouse. I love the bench seat top, the color of the wood stain, and its thickness - but, the bench legs and seat frame are PALE GREEN, not white or off-white. In spite of the other reviews warning of the green hue, I hoped this bench might blend with the white wood furniture I already own, but it does not - the contrast is extreme. I will need to return this - such a disappontment.
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Highly reccomend
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this bench! It’s the perfect width for sitting and my toddlers fit great on them. Easy to assemble and very nice quality.
customer_reviews.author: Hi'ilani

customer_reviews.title: A Real value!
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful piece of furniture. It is solid wood, beautifully crafted, came with an Allen wrench, a ratchet and spare screws. All this with a great price. Definitely a worthy investment!
customer_reviews.author: Edmund

customer_reviews.title: Great for dining room
customer_reviews.text: We were on a budget trying to get all the furniture for a new department. These benches together with the table made a great addition to our dining room. Takes up very little space, it is easy to clean, and it is very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Ezequiel

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, sturdy, looks pricey for a budget to save dining space
customer_reviews.text: I did not expect it to look as good as it does considering the price! The wood grain looks pretty expensive and the assembly was really a breeze with the additional tool that Zinus includes. The espresso is really as described, maybe a hair lighter but looks beautiful as a space saving seating option for my dining area. Highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Sami

customer_reviews.title: Good bench
customer_reviews.text: It's a good sturdy bench, easy to put together. I was just disappointed in the color. The legs are darker than the top and the top is more dark brown than it is espresso. It doesn't match our table, which is an espresso color. It would be 5 stars is the coloring matched what was advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Whitny Anderson

product_meta.title: Zinus Becky Farmhouse Wood Bench
product_meta.description: Color:Farmhouse| Style:Bench OnlyWith painted legs and base and neutral wood tone surface the Zinus farmhouse wood bench will add country style character to your kitchen. Easy to assemble in minutes with sturdy wood construction for durability and long lasting use. Worry-free 1-year warranty.
feature_bullets: Two-tone painted pine wood for Country style Charm
Measures 36.2 inch x 14 inch x 18 inch

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars721 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
